text: If anyone is to go into captivity, he will go into captivity. If anyone is to be killed with the sword, he must be killed.13:10 TR reads “If anyone leads into captivity, into captivity he goes. If anyone will kill with the sword, he must be killed with a sword.” instead of “If anyone is to go into captivity, he will go into captivity. If anyone is to be killed with the sword, he must be killed.”  Here is the endurance and the faith of the saints.
